FuncDef:
The ipv4-family flow command enables a BGP IPv4 Flow Specification address family and displays the BGP-Flow address family view.
The undo ipv4-family command deletes the BGP-Flow address family.
By default, no BGP IPv4 Flow Specification address family is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before performing BGP configurations in BGP-Flow address family view, you must run the ipv4-family flow command in the BGP view to enable the BGP-Flow address family, and then enter the BGP-Flow address family view.
Configuration Impact
After the ipv4-family flow command is run, the created BGP Flow Specification route is imported to the BGP routing table.
Precautions
Running the undo ipv4-family flow command can delete all configurations from the BGP-Flow address family view and the BGP Flow Specification route from the BGP routing table.
